tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MaterialTrends (
  trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_id INT,
  observation_date DATE,
  price DECIMAL,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES BuildingMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE price_trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES building_materials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE material_prices (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    material_id INT REFERENCES building_materials(id),
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES suppliers(id),
    price DECIMAL,
    date_recorded DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PriceHistory (
	history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	material_id INT,
	price DECIMAL,
	history_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES BuildingMaterials(material_id)
);

CREATE TABLE RegionalPrices (
	region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	price DECIMAL,
	history_id INT,
	supplier_id INT,
	history_date DATE,
	FOREIGN KEY (history_id) REFERENCES PriceHistory(history_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (supplier_id) REFERENCES Suppliers(supplier_id)
);
